casebody.data:
No. 1440,

Misc.

Gary v. Follette, Warden. John W. Castles III for petitioner. Louis J. Lefkowitz, Attorney General of New York, Samuel A. Hirshowitz, First Assistant Attorney General, and Stephen P. Seligman, Deputy Assistant Attorney General, for respondent.

C. A. 2d Cir. Certiorari denied.
